overview: Terry is applying for a job as a live-in maid. On her way to the interview, she picks up Sasha Gabor, whose car has broken down on the side of the road. With Sasha in the car, Terry satisfies herself before dropping him off and going to meet Harvey and Magda. Terry soon finds out that Harvey has invented a robot capable of serving drinks and satisfying women with a penis attachment.
title: Amber Aroused
